mapper.select: SELECT id, agent_template_id, name, owner_type, owner_id, is_only_for_internal, state, birthday FROM agent WHERE owner_type = #{ownerType} AND owner_id = #{ownerId} AND state = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO agent (id, agent_template_id, name, owner_type, owner_id, is_only_for_internal, state, birthday) VALUES (#{id}, #{agentTemplateId}, #{name}, #{ownerType}, #{ownerId}, #{isOnlyForInternal}, #{state}, #{birthday})
